entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: Ollivander is introduced as someone who is flitting around the shelves, taking down boxes. He is described as giving instructions to Mr Potter.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Mr Potter is mentioned as being given a wand by Ollivander.

relationships.description: Ollivander gives a wand to Mr Potter, described as 'Beechwood and dragon heartstring. Nine inches. Nice and flexible.'
